10211.name: West Staircase
description: The stairs going up are lined in gold and carpeted in a {RD{reep {RR{red{x,
yet inviting cover.  The stairs are made of alternation Ivory and
Pearl, one after another.  Small statuettes of the revered Shadow
Angels line the walls at each Pearl step.

10240.name: A Humid, Ebony Tiled Hallway
description: The hallway is differenct from the smooth ebony passage, close to
here.  Shiny ebony tiles with golden trim line the floor in a
haphazard pattern, and the air seems to be foggy with humidity.

10207.name: Eastern Commons: {^Traning Room{x
description: Heavy square rigged beams crisscross the ceiling here, holding up
various heavy-set sandbags.  The stone walls are lined with wooden
dollouts.  On some walls there are racks with wooden swords and
training weapons, and various Kanji are brushed on delicate paper,
hanging on the high walls, like a mantra.
The only enemy is fear. Fear inhibits rational thought.  If you have no fear, then nothing is impossible.
If your enemy is weaker than you, crush him.
If he is as strong as you are, outmanuver him.
If he is stronger than you are, abdicate and battle him another day.
{x                                                                     {!S{1un-{!T{1zu{x
{x                                                              {!T{1he-{!A{1rt {1of {!W{1ar{x

10219.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
A plaque on the door tells what awaits you beyond.
The Pearl Hallways, beyond this parition.
Honour the {^B{*lue{^E{*yed {^S{*hadow{7 in all ways.
Praise be to the Angel wings.

10237.name: a BlackLight Hallway
description: The darkened hallways is illuminated only by artifical light from
small blobes in the ceiling.  The light cast from them is odd in it's
own way.  Whites become purples, and blues become black, greens become
light blue, and the cycle continues.  The air in the hallway is warm
and humid, strange for such a place.

10225.name: Senate Walkway
description: The centre isle of the Consulate's debate area.  No doubt that
debates never occurr in front of visitors, but the hall can easily
accomodate over fifty speakers on either side of you.  A few of the
seats are taken up by studiers and researchers, busy at some project
or other.  Further down the carpeted isle, lies the listener's chair
filing desks.

10236.name: Darkangel worker common female
description: The darkened hallways is illuminated only by artifical light from
small blobes in the ceiling.  The light cast from them is odd in it's
own way.  Whites become purples, and blues become black, greens become
light blue, and the cycle continues.  The air in the hallway is warm
and humid, strange for such a place.

10215.name: The Senate Gates
description: The Senate Gates are a lustrous mahagony varnished to perfection,
lined with iron reinforcements.  The Gates, are usually opened, except
when the Consulate is in session.  The {Bb{bl{Bu{be{x carpets of the hallways
crisscross with the {#g{3o{#l{3d{#e{3n{x weave of the senate entryway carpeting.
The grating to the south is made of polished steel.  Designed to
keep something in... or at least to keep people out.
There is a plaque on the grating, that would enlighten you as to
what lies beyond.
{!B{*eyond this gate lies the city of the damnned.{x
{!T{*he city of those who would mar the face of Humanity.{x
{!T{*hose who seek to bring destruction to civilization,{x
{!S{*hall meet the unending wrath of the {^B{*lue{^E{*yed {^S{*hadow.{x

10214.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
Standing here, you are close to the Consulate Senate Area.

10202.name: The Pages' Hallway
description: A luxurious Ancient Roman Quad-Arch divides the hallway here, the
ceiling illustrating a large crowd of people, being defended by Black
Winged Angels, against what seems to be a wave of darkness.  Each
Hallway is made of a different substance: West is the Ivory Hallway,
and East is the Pearl Hallway.  The northern block leads to the second
floor.
There is a plaque on the door, with simple directions engraved on it.
The Pearl Hallways, beyond this parition.
Honour the {^B{*lue{^E{*yed {^S{*hadow{7 in all ways.
Praise be to the Angel wings.
{^F{*ar {^R{*ight{x:  The Dining Halls.
{^F{*ar {^L{*eft{x:  The Dojo.

10238.name: a BlackLight Hallway
description: The darkened hallways is illuminated only by artifical light from
small blobes in the ceiling.  The light cast from them is odd in it's
own way.  Whites become purples, and blues become black, greens become
light blue, and the cycle continues.  The air in the hallway is warm
and humid, strange for such a place.

10203.name: Entrance Staircase
description: The stairs going up are lined in gold and carpeted in a {RD{reep {RR{red {x,
yet inviting cover.  The stairs are made of alternation Ivory and
Pearl, one after another.  Small statuettes of the revered Shadow
Angels line the walls at each Pearl step.

10201.name: Inside the Spire
description: Polished ruby candelabraes take place either side of you along the
{Bblue {xcarpeting, which leads down the hall.  This seems to be a place
of interest for the residents, with a good number of them going about
their daily business.
Tall pillars made of carven rock seem more to be decorations, rather
than structural support.  Along the hallway walls, tapestries with the
AngelWing Symbol drape down, proudly depicting the insignia.

10221.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
The hallway is close to the intersections of the Page's Hallway.

10216.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns

Standing here, you are close to the Consulate Senate Area.

10224.name: Western Commons: {^Dining Hall{x
description: A large luxurious {*E{7b{*o{&n{*y{x table takes up half the room, polished to a
shiny gloss, its corners rounded to smooth perfection.  Tapestries
hang from the high ceiling, coloured in {*Blacks {xand {^Blues.  {x
Masterpeice paintings hang from the walls and one recent rendition of
Lady Nali, hangs above the fireplace.

10222.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
The hallway is close to the intersections of the Page's Hallway.

10241.name: A Humid, Ebony Tiled Hallway
description: The hallway is differenct from the smooth ebony passage, close to
here.  Shiny ebony tiles with golden trim line the floor in a
haphazard pattern, and the air seems to be foggy with humidity.
There is a smooth oaken swing-door, that has two circular glassed surfaces on it.
Through the glass window, you can see the inside of what seems to
be a changing room of sorts.  There are a few sets of clothing on the
hangers, and one worker angel cleans up in the room.

10206.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
The hallway is close to the intersections of the Page's Hallway.

10220.name: Ivory Wing Staircase
description: The stairs going up are lined in gold and carpeted in a {RD{reep {RR{red{x,
yet inviting cover.  The stairs are made of alternation Ivory and
Pearl, one after another.  Small statuettes of the revered Shadow
Angels line the walls at each Pearl step.

10230.name: Secret Path to Nali's Bathhouse
description: Behind the mural, a smoothly carved hallway made out of the exact
polished stone that the spire itself is hewn from.  A small globe of
light hangs above, dimly lighting the room for you to walk in.

10208.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
The hallway is close to the intersections of the Page's Hallway.

10217.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns

floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
Standing here, you are close to the Consulate Senate Area.

10209.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
A plaque on the door tells what awaits you beyond.
The Pearl Hallways, beyond this parition.
Honour the {^B{*lue{B{^E{*yed {^S{*hadow{7 in all ways.
Praise be to the Angel wings.

10204.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
The hallway is close to the intersections of the Page's Hallway.

10228.name: The Listener and Filing Areas
description: The Listener's chair is much alike the senate's seating
arrangements, save that this one is solitary.  A series of other
chairs are arranged on the level below, for the pages to sit in during
their record keeping.  The walls in the background have a mural of the
Angel Wing Sigil, upon a setting sun, on an ocean horizon.
However,  standing here, there's something that feels out of place...
Something is not quite right in the area...

10200.name: Gate to the Spire
description: The sheer, smoothly cut ebony walls of the spire are polished to a
perfect gloss.  It's uncanny how mirror-like the reflection on the
walls seem to be.  Attempting to discern the spire's size can be a
daunting, if not confusing task.
In front of you, a modest steel door lies closed.  Large, plain
door-knockers lie in front.  The Door dosen't seem to have a lock.

10212.name: The Ivory Halllways
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
Standing here, you are close to the Consulate Senate Area.

10218.name: The Ivory Hallway
description: The Ivory Hallways are a beautiful sight.  Pearly white walls of
solid ivroy colored stone.  A continous script of curves and
scriptures are carven into the walls in the middle, forming patterns
that are pleasing to the mind, yet impossible to understand.  The
floor is polished {&s{7i{&l{&v{7e{&r{x with {BD{beep {BB{blue{x carpeting.
Standing here, you are close to the Consulate Senate Area.

10242.name: Changing Area
description: The changing room is large in its own right, with numerous areas to
hang your belongings.  There is an abundance of soft {^light blue{x towels
here and there.  The air is humid, and moisture collects on your skin
and belongings.  You must be close to a source of massive hot water.
The southern door has circular glass windows, and the northern door
has a sign on it.
Through the glass window, you can see the tiled ebony hallway, each
tile perfectly trimmed with runed golden markings.  The hallway, lit
with artifical black lighting makes for a intriguing play on colors.
Another one of the wonders the {^B{*lue{^E{*yed {^S{*hadow {xbrings.
{@U{2p {@A{2head{@: {^P{8ool {^A{8rea{x.

10227.name: Senate Seating Area
description: Large, cushioned chairs offer the height of comfort for the senate
speakers.  Each chair has the capability of swiveling a full circle,
and has special divisions in the backrest to allow for wings.  Padded
arm rests on each side, have small compartments that you can get
writing utilities from, and a modest desk is available to write on at
a speaker's leisure.

10226.name: Senate Seating Area
description: Large, cushioned chairs offer the height of comfort for the senate
speakers.  Each chair has the capability of swiveling a full circle,
and has special divisions in the backrest to allow for wings.  Padded
arm rests on each side, have small compartments that you can get
writing utilities from, and a modest desk is available to write on at
a speaker's leisure.

10200.name: a Male Dark Angel Worker~
10200.room_name: A handsome figure is here, take care of the castle.

10201.name: A Female Dark Angel~
10201.room_name: A beautiful and seductive Angel is here, cleaning up.

10202.name: Osagea~
description:
Osagea is a noble Dark Angel, who carries himself with grace and
pride.  However, he does not let his status detract from his manners,
and is always kind and polite.  Osagea always carries his longsword
with him, being skilled in its use.  He is also adept at earth
elemental magic, and has combined his sword skills with his elemental
mastery to form several devastating elemental sword attacks.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M greet 10208 100~
M fight 10200 50~
10202.room_name: A tall man stands here, black wings folded behind him.

10203.name: Ikomeu~
description:
Ikomeu is a noble Dark Angel, beauty and grace combined with
dignity and kindness.  However, she distrusts outsiders, and anyone
she does not know well.  Once she knows you, however, she is a loyal
friend and always a good person to be around.  Her specialty is fear
magic...  For in her words, "If a foe fears you, not their size nor
their skill shall save them from your wrath."  She has crafted several
spells that use her mace as a focus point for their effect, and she
can send many a foe running for their lives with a single grazing
blow.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 10201 50~
10203.room_name: A beautiful dark angel stands here, wings folded behind her.

10204.name: Ayahue~
description:
Ayahue is a shy young girl.  She is small and frail, but attractive
in her own way, and with a dazzling intellect that puts many scholars
to shame.  She is very mild-mannered and submissive, avoiding conflict
whenever possible, but not backing away when it does arrive. 
Channeling the power of the stars is Ayahue's specialty, and her
magical attacks are more potent than her appearance might suggest.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M greet 10207 75~
M fight 10202 50~
10204.room_name: A petite, cute girl studies you, wings folded behind her back.
10204.keywords: ayahue petite cute girl dark angel~

10205.name: Urayoi~
description:
Urayoi is a strong martial arts fighter, using only his body in
combat, not any weapon of any kind.  He is a kind and thoughtful man,
peaceful except when provoked, and then he is lethal.  He will gladly
fight to the death to protect Nali's honor, or to protect Nali
herself.  Despite his size, his movements are graceful, and he has an
excellent grasp of manners and politeness.  He has trained extensively
with thunder elemental powers, and has merged them with his own
fighting style to form several powerful techniques.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M greet 10206 75~
M fight 10203 50~
10205.room_name: A dark angel glances at you, his muscled frame relaxed.
10205.keywords: urayoi dark angel male muscled muscular~

10206.name: Eferigu~
description:
Not much is known about this enigmatic Dark Angel...  The only one
who truely knows his motivation and his morals is Nali.  He stays out
of sight, avoiding others, and will go to any lengths to keep himself
hidden.  He was most likely an assassin before becoming a Dark Angel,
his poisoned daggers and incredible camoflague skills hinting at this.
He has studied the nature of shadows and darkness extensively, and is
attuned to the dark so well that he can be near invisible in any
amount of darkness.  Eferigu's favorite method of attack is fading
into the shadows and then surprising his opponant with a stab to the
back, then disappearing back into the shadows for another attempt.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 10204 50~
10206.room_name: A male's silhouette can be seen faintly in the shadows.

10207.name: Iyasorui~
description:
Beautiful to an extreme, Iyasorui has a near perfect figure.  Her
curves, voice, perfume, and hair all radiate seduction, and she uses
that raw sensuality to move up in life.  Be it wooing the rich for
their gold, or bedding a target and then killing him at the height of
passion, she can almost always find a way to twist her beauty to
fulfill her wants and desires.  It is said she has developped a form
of fighting that uses her beauty as weapon...  If that is true, very
little would be able to stand against her, for her beauty is nearly
unmatched, the Excalibur of attraction.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M fight 10210 90~
10207.room_name: A seductive {^S{*hadow {^A{*ngel{x stands here, wearing a revealing outfit.
